title.bibl: Denni Hlasatel, Jan. 2, 1911. Czech Congressman in Support of Harrison

div.bibl: Denni Hlasatel, Jan. 2, 1911. CZECH CONGRESSMAN IN SUPPORT OF HARRISON

body.p: The candidacy of Carter H. Harrison for mayor, received a strong boost in the speech delivered by Congressman A. J. Sabath, during a meeting of the United Democrats of Cook County, in the Armory of the Second regiment, last night. The Mayor also addressed the gathering, which unanimously denounced, in strong terms, the policies of the County Board and those of Roger C. Sullivan.
